title: Looking for a Silver+ Support main for a team rank team
body:
Hello, we are currently looking for a support main who can play a variety of champions (to a decent level). Please note we are only starting out as a team so we are in Silver, however, if possible we would like a permanent fifth member to play with us who can help us get better as a team. 

It would be BETTER if you lived in NZ as then we could organise times to NZ level but we do not discriminate against Australians :p.

If interested, please add me in game!

Thank you!

replies.body:

Hello i am looking for a team like this one. I live in NSW, in Sydney but anyway.
I main support and love carry and helping my team. I can play every role if you need. 
My summoners name: Wrozze
I can play only weeks, at 6 pm.

last season was Gold 2 support Main, currently Silver 5 after terrible provisionals (everyone knows how they go) 
Blitz, Nami, Thresh, Morg and Soraka are my champs, IGN: HWP Guado

Hiya im silver 2.
IGN: Frostwolf77

Its not my main; but i play supp well. Give me a try.
Hey I main adc/support and would love to join
